author: Portalfin
description:
Online startup Page, Dashboard, Portal 

Platform provides easy to use small applications known as Widgets.  These widgets help user to do day to day tasks like.

•	Access Facebook Widget in easy and simple way to communicate with friends, relative.
•	Access LinkedIn Widget to view current happening in professional circle.
•	Do searches, save criteria using search widget and publish them.
•	Search Wikipedia and Bookmark wikis and publish them as widget.
•	Create grocery List, Track children activity, create Task List, Notes, City Time, Weather, Organization chart and Map as Utility Widgets
•	Developer and designer can make Widgets and Templates using Form Designer, Presentation Designer, Code editor, Ajax Editor Widgets 
•	Online form designer widget helps create HTML forms for your blog, site, contact forms, feedback by drag and drop form elements and publish it to our website, blog and receive submission.
•	Entrepreneur can publishes their business plan using Funding Widgets for capital need for their venture.
•	Publish Ads and content in different format using Ads Widgets like carousel, slideshow, publish catalog.
•	Children can create and publish book using book widgets using the ideas.  
•	Time Line widget to publish events with date and time.
•	Publish the generated content to websites, blogs, Facebook, LinkedIn, Google+ and other social networking website.
•	Publish videos into categories and sorted list using video gallery. Helps Users, Artists, Companies and Business to organize video in categories.
•	RSS Widget allows user to subscribe to various Feed and content and publish them to its own blog, websites.
•	Project Management Widget manage projects, Task and online business to increase productivity, prevent delays and minimize cost 
•	Data Analysis Widget
•	Data Visualization Widget
•	Configurable User interface where user can chose what, where and how to see the content
These Easy-to-use widgets give ease of changing content and publishing work in real time. Adding these widgets to any website, blog, social media is easy just a click and paste.
name: dashboard
